text: Tetragonia tetragonoides, commonly called New Zealand spinach and other local names, is a flowering plant in the fig-marigold family (Aizoaceae). It is often cultivated as a leafy vegetable. ==Gallery== File:Tetragonia flower MRD Otari.jpg|Flower File:Tetragonia tetragonioides (Flower).jpg|T. tetragonoides showing erect growth ==References== Category:Leaf vegetables Category:Caryophyllales
title: Tetragonia tetragonoides
